lessons.title: Check Cluster Info
lessons.note: Get cluster info, context, and config.
lessons.code:
kubectl cluster-info
kubectl config view
kubectl config current-context

lessons.title: View Nodes
lessons.note: List all nodes with status, labels, and capacity.
lessons.code:
kubectl get nodes
kubectl describe node <node-name>
kubectl get nodes -o wide

lessons.title: Check Cluster Resources
lessons.note: View resource usage and limits on nodes.
lessons.code: kubectl top nodes

lessons.title: List Pods
lessons.note: View all pods in the current or specified namespace.
lessons.code:
kubectl get pods
kubectl get pods -n <namespace>
kubectl get pods -o wide

lessons.title: Describe Pod
lessons.note: Detailed info about a pod, events, and container statuses.
lessons.code:
kubectl describe pod <pod-name>
kubectl describe pod <pod-name> -n <namespace>

lessons.title: Create Pod
lessons.note: Run a pod using YAML or directly with CLI.
lessons.code:
kubectl apply -f pod.yaml
kubectl run mypod --image=nginx --restart=Never

lessons.title: Delete Pod
lessons.note: Remove a pod or multiple pods.
lessons.code:
kubectl delete pod <pod-name>
kubectl delete pod <pod-name> -n <namespace>
kubectl delete pods --all

lessons.title: Pod Logs
lessons.note: View logs of a pod container (single/multi-container).
lessons.code:
kubectl logs <pod-name>
kubectl logs -f <pod-name> -c <container-name>
kubectl logs --tail=100 <pod-name>

lessons.title: Exec into Pod
lessons.code:
kubectl exec -it <pod-name> -- /bin/bash
kubectl exec -it <pod-name> -n <namespace> -- sh

lessons.title: Port Forward
lessons.note: Access pod locally by forwarding ports.
lessons.code:
kubectl port-forward <pod-name> 8080:80
kubectl port-forward svc/<service-name> 8080:80

lessons.title: Create Deployment
lessons.code:
kubectl apply -f deployment.yaml
kubectl create deployment nginx-deploy --image=nginx

lessons.title: Scale Deployment
lessons.code:
kubectl scale deployment <name> --replicas=3
kubectl scale deployment nginx-deploy --replicas=5 -n <namespace>

lessons.title: Update Deployment
lessons.code:
kubectl set image deployment/<name> <container>=<image>:<tag>
kubectl rollout restart deployment/<name>

lessons.title: Rollback Deployment
lessons.code:
kubectl rollout undo deployment/<name>
kubectl rollout status deployment/<name>

lessons.title: Check Deployment Status
lessons.code:
kubectl get deployments
kubectl describe deployment <name>

lessons.title: List Services
lessons.note: List all services in a namespace.
lessons.code:
kubectl get svc
kubectl get svc -n <namespace>
kubectl get svc -o wide

lessons.title: Describe Service
lessons.note: Detailed info about a service, endpoints, and ports.
lessons.code:
kubectl describe svc <service-name>
kubectl describe svc <service-name> -n <namespace>

lessons.title: Expose Deployment
lessons.note: Create a service for a deployment or pod.
lessons.code:
kubectl expose deployment <name> --type=ClusterIP --port=80
kubectl expose pod <pod-name> --type=NodePort --port=8080

lessons.title: Ingress
lessons.code:
kubectl apply -f ingress.yaml
kubectl get ingress
kubectl describe ingress <name>

lessons.title: ConfigMaps
lessons.code:
kubectl create configmap <name> --from-literal=key=value
kubectl get configmap
kubectl describe configmap <name>
kubectl apply -f configmap.yaml

lessons.title: Secrets
lessons.code:
kubectl create secret generic <name> --from-literal=password=1234
kubectl get secret
kubectl describe secret <name>
kubectl apply -f secret.yaml

lessons.title: Use Config & Secrets in Pods
lessons.note: Mount or inject into environment variables.
lessons.code:
envFrom:
  - configMapRef:
      name: my-config
  - secretRef:
      name: my-secret

lessons.title: List Namespaces
lessons.note: Show all namespaces in the cluster.
lessons.code: kubectl get namespaces

lessons.title: Switch Namespace
lessons.code: kubectl config set-context --current --namespace=<namespace>

lessons.title: Create & Delete Namespace
lessons.code:
kubectl create namespace <name>
kubectl delete namespace <name>

lessons.title: Add Labels
lessons.code:
kubectl label pod <pod-name> env=prod
kubectl label deployment <name> version=v1

lessons.title: View Labels
lessons.code:
kubectl get pods --show-labels
kubectl get pods -l env=prod

lessons.title: Add Annotations
lessons.code: kubectl annotate pod <pod-name> description='My app pod'

lessons.title: Apply YAML
lessons.note: Create or update resources from YAML files.
lessons.code:
kubectl apply -f <file>.yaml
kubectl apply -k <directory>

lessons.title: Delete Resource
lessons.note: Delete pods, deployments, or any resource.
lessons.code:
kubectl delete -f <file>.yaml
kubectl delete pod <name>
kubectl delete deployment <name>

lessons.title: View Events
lessons.code:
kubectl get events
kubectl describe pod <pod-name> | grep Events -A 10

lessons.title: Top Pods & Nodes
lessons.code:
kubectl top pod
kubectl top pod -n <namespace>
kubectl top node

lessons.title: Edit Resource
lessons.code:
kubectl edit deployment <name>
kubectl edit pod <pod-name>
